abstract: There are now three iPhone 4S carriers. Here's one way to calculate which one is best for you.
snippet: There are now three iPhone 4S carriers. Here's one way to calculate which one is best for you.
lead_paragraph: If you're in the market for an iPhone 4S, you may be wondering which carrier you should give your money to. After all, you now have a new choice to consider, Sprint, not to mention the ever-shifting landscape of each carrier's plans and add-ons. Let's try to break it down.

headline.main: How to Pick the Best iPhone 4S Carrier
